meta.title: Information About The Coronavirus — Stark High School

meta.content: Information About The Coronavirus — Stark High School

News about the Coronavirus (known as COVID-19) has been making the headlines. Human-to-human transmission of the new coronavirus has been verified but is limited in the United States. As of February 27, 2020, there are currently no confirmed cases in Ohio. While, the Centers for Disease Control

div.p:
News about the Coronavirus (known as COVID-19) has been making the headlines. Human-to-human transmission of the new coronavirus has been verified but is limited in the United States. As of February 27, 2020, there are currently no confirmed cases in Ohio.
While, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) continues to stress that risk is low for the general public, as a part of its response, the CDC is encouraging everyone to prepare in case the situation changes. The agency is currently updating guidance for childcare and K-12 settings around COVID-19, which will be reposted on the CDC website once it is finalized.

div.class: sqs-layout sqs-grid-12 columns-12 Footer-blocks Footer-blocks--top sqs-alternate-block-style-container

div.p: Come in for a tour of our building, or give us a call at 234-214-4140, weekdays between 8 am and 3 pm. We can't wait to see you!
